The {{translation|'''Character Bind Technique'''|字縛術|Jibakujutsu}} was a technique developed by [[Shiranami]]. By pointing his finger out at a target and writing the proper kanji in the air, this technique produces a variety of effects. 

== Known Words ==
The effects of these kanji have been shown:
* 操, which comes from the verb {{translation|操る|ayatsuru}}, meaning "to manipulate". This character allows Shiranami to manipulate and control his opponent. The effect manifests when Shiranami writes the kanji in the air at the target's direction; at which point, the kanji appears on the recipient's person. That individual then becomes a subject to Shiranami's will. However, as with the [[Infinite Embrace]], it is not absolute, since a person with tremendous chakra can easily dispel the effect.
* 滅, which comes from the verb {{translation|滅する|messuru}}, meaning "to destroy". Shiranami uses this character to track down and destroy a message sent by carrier pigeon. [[Utakata]] destroyed the word before it could fulfil its purpose.
* {{translation|岩|iwa|rock}}. This character allows Shiranami to immobilise targets. In the case of [[Shadow Clone Technique|clones]], this dispels them.
* {{translation|爆|baku|explode}}. This character causes several explosions that can also be used to dispel clones.
* {{translation|火|hi|fire}}. This character creates a blaze of fire, which can vary in size.
* {{translation|炎|en|flames}}. This character creates a large wall of fire to keep the enemies away.
* {{translation|斬|zan}}, which comes from the verb {{translation|斬る|kiru}}, meaning "to kill with a blade". This character creates several blades of wind.
* {{translation|割|katsu|split}}. This character causes the ground underneath the target to split open.
